Dating: CHRISTIAN PERIOD (not before); CHRISTIAN PERIOD; ISLAMIC PERIOD (not after)
Name: Bowl of a pipe
Description: Fragment of a pipe corresponding to the bowl. Paste of a grayish colour. It presents a moulding at the end in the shape of a ring with an incised decoration consisting of small vertical strokes forming a band. The rest of the piece shows a geometrical decoration made by impression, demarcated by incised lines.
